channel.title: Command Please
channel.description:
Hey guys, I just noticed that on my server when you try to dismiss a familiar it dosn't disappear. Can someone please write me a command that when you type ::dismiss it changes hasFollower =(what ever the follower is) to hasFollower =0
Thanks guys.

item.title: Command Please
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("dismiss")) { c.hasFollower = -1; }
if this command does not work

if (playerCommand.startsWith("dismiss")) { if(c.lastsummon > 0) { c.firstslot(); for(int i = 0; i < 29; i += 1) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.storeditems[i], Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absX, Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.summoningnpcid].absY, 1, c.playerId); c.storeditems[i] = -1; c.occupied[i] = false; } c.lastsummon = -1; c.totalstored = 0; c.summoningnpcid = 0; c.summoningslot = 0; c.sendMessage("Your BoB items have drop on the floor"); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have a npc currently spawned"); } }

but come on now, this is simple stuff

Read full topic

PI Sorry for not saying that.
